ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-s2 | |- <" S S "> = ( <" S "> concat <" S "> ) |
| 2 |  | #P_1nn0 | |- 1 e. NN0 |
| 3 |  | #P_repswccat | |- ( ( S e. V /\ 1 e. NN0 /\ 1 e. NN0 ) -> ( ( S repeatS 1 ) concat ( S repeatS 1 ) ) = ( S repeatS ( 1 + 1 ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 2, 3 | #P_mp3an23 | |- ( S e. V -> ( ( S repeatS 1 ) concat ( S repeatS 1 ) ) = ( S repeatS ( 1 + 1 ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_repsw1 | |- ( S e. V -> ( S repeatS 1 ) = <" S "> ) |
| 6 | 5, 5 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( S e. V -> ( ( S repeatS 1 ) concat ( S repeatS 1 ) ) = ( <" S "> concat <" S "> ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_1p1e2 | |- ( 1 + 1 ) = 2 |
| 8 | 7 | #P_a1i | |- ( S e. V -> ( 1 + 1 ) = 2 ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( S e. V -> ( S repeatS ( 1 + 1 ) ) = ( S repeatS 2 ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 6, 9 | #P_3eqtr3d | |- ( S e. V -> ( <" S "> concat <" S "> ) = ( S repeatS 2 ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_syl5req | |- ( S e. V -> ( S repeatS 2 ) = <" S S "> ) |
